host_alias: {list: list of extra domain names to serve the application at}

email.sender: {string: email that will appear as the sender when CVs are added and accepted}
email.recipients: {list: list of admin emails that will receive a notification whenever a CV has been added and needs approval}

recaptcha.secret_key: {string: secret key given by the google captcha service}
recaptcha.user_key: {string: user key given by the google captcha service}

databases.name: default
databases.host: {string: default database server name or ip} (e.g. localhost)

databases.name: vocabularies
databases.host: {string: vocabularies database server name or ip} (e.g. localhost)
